00053 
00054         /*
00055          * A function that takes a set of lines (a contour) and checks if the angles of the lines have the same sign.
00056          * This function is used in linkConnectedLines to fulfill the curvature condition.
00057          */
00058         bool anglesHaveSameSign(cv::vector<float> anglesOfOneContour, double thresholdRatio);
00059 
00060         /*
00061          * A function that checks the difference in angles for successive lines in a contour. Needed for the connectivity criteria.
00062          */
